Settings.Title: RogueTech
Settings.Text: War is Business, and Business is Hell Welcome to the Inner Sphere, Commander You are a Mercenary, standing on the Bridge of your very own Argo, a mobile Space Station, looking forward to a life of conflict among the warring factions of Humanity. Will you Prosper, or be remembered only as yet another thug who couldn't cut it?
